body: You grew up among the outcasts and outlaws of your society, learning to forage and survive in an urban environment. Select one of the following skills: Disable Device, Escape Artist, or Sleight of Hand. You gain a +1 trait bonus on that skill, and it is always a class skill for you.
name: Vagabond Child
url: pfsrd://Advanced Players Guide/Rules/New Rules/Traits/Regional Traits/Vagabond Child
